text: hi i'm dave farley
i'm a software developer a regular
speaker and attendee at go-to
conferences around the world
i'm probably best known as one of the
authors of the book
continuous delivery and maybe as one of
the authors of the reactive manifesto
i also run a youtube channel called
continuous delivery
in which i explore ideas about
continuous delivery devops test-driven
development
bdd software engineering and software
development in general
my aim is to produce content that helps
you in practical ways
but also maybe piques your interest and
gets you thinking about things a little
differently
i'm occasionally a bit opinionated about
some of this stuff
i've teamed up with my friends at goto
to share some of my content with you
we'll be publishing a selection of my
videos as a monthly series for goto's
community of software developers
we hope that you enjoy it and if you do
and would like to see more from me
head on over to my continuous delivery
youtube channel too
